title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 2.6 - Prior notice for foreign banking corporations with branch or agency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 2.6 - Prior notice for foreign banking corporations with branch or agency

State Regulations
A foreign banking corporation which maintains a New York

State-licensed branch or agency may, unless otherwise advised by the
superintendent, obtain a license to establish a representative office in this

State with 45 days prior written notice to the
superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
2.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
